segments.text: I wanna register for this mathematics course .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I ’ m sorry registration has closed .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Closed ? The clerk told me I could come back and register any time during the first week of classes .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , that ’ s not possible . The computer ’ s official student account has already been sent to the state . And that ’ s what our budget is based on . Who told you that anyway ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Some woman in here when I tried to register three weeks ago . She said I just had to pay a late fee .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: She must have been a part-time worker . They didn ’ t have much training . Why didn ’ t you register then ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: She said I couldn ’ t until I had my birth certificate . Here it is .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Huh , that is no reason to demand a birth certificate . We only need to establish residency , you know , a phone bill with your name and address on it would have been fine .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Serious ? Only the proof of my address .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I am afraid she gave you the wrong information .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , I sympathize with your problem , but , to be honest , I don ’ t think there is any thing anyone can do for you . You were trapped in the system.If you want , you can talk to the director . She will help you if she can .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Don ’ t get your hopes up .
segments.speaker: S2
